attributes.action: Lower the legal age of sex
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have heard a lot of stories about teenagers that have been put on the sex offenders register for having sex with someone under the age of 16. But most of these were actually couples that were in love. I don't think it is fair as if you love someone you should be able to have sex with them without having to worry about the consequences.
